key.name: settings-migrated
key.description: Set to true after copying old settings from a gtimelogrc file. If false, and if a gtimelogrc exists, settings from the gtimelogrc will be copied into GSettings.

key.name: show-task-pane
key.description: If true, the sidebar with a list of tasks is shown.

key.name: task-pane-position
key.description: The width of the time log area to the left of the task pane.

key.name: window-size
key.description: Size of the application window (width and height).

key.name: hours
key.description: Target hours of work, to be used for estimating time left to work.

key.name: office-hours
key.description: Target hours of work (including breaks), to be used for estimating time left at the office.

key.name: virtual-midnight
key.description: Hour and minute that say when a work day ends and another begins.

key.name: list-email
key.description: Email to send activity reports to.

key.name: remote-task-list
key.description: If true, the task sidebar will show tasks fetched from a specified task list URL.

key.name: task-list-url
key.description: URL for fetching tasks for the task pane. Expects a plain text response with one task name per line, with an optional category in front (delimited with a ':').

key.name: task-list-edit-url
key.description: URL for editing tasks for the task pane. Will be opened in a browser window if the user asks to edit tasks.
